title: Glory v1 0-34 + Glory v2 0-2 + One Shots (1995-2013) (Complete)
description:
English | CBR | 49 Issues

Glory #0-15
Publisher:  Image Comics
Publication Date:  March 1995 - September 1996

Glory #17-22
Publisher:  Maximum Press
Publication Date:  November 1996 - April 1997

Glory #23-34
Publisher:  Image Comics
Publication Date:  February 15, 2012 - April 3, 2013

Glory #0-15 was published by Image.  Glory #16 was skipped in the switch-over from Image to Maximum Press.  It was intended that Glory #16 would be re-solicited at a later date, but issue #16 was never published.  Glory #17-22 were published by Maximum Press until the series was canceled.  After a 10 year hiatus, Image rebooted the series with Glory #23-34.

Publisher:  Image Comics
Glory / Avengelyne
Publication Date:  October 1995

Glory & Friends Bikini Fest
Publication Date:  September 1995

Glory & Friends Lingerie Special
Publication Date:  September 1995

Glory & Friends Christmas Special
Publication Date:  December 1995

Avengelyn/Glory: Rage of Angels
Publication Date:  March 1996

Glory/Angela: Angels in Hell
Publication Date:  April 1996

Glory Celestine: Dark Angel #1 and #3
Publication Date:  September and November 1996
Glory Celestine: Dark Angel #2 was never published.

Publisher:  Maximum Press
Avengelyne / Glory
Publication Date:  September 1995

Avengelyne/Glory: Swimsuit
Publication Date:  June 1996

Avengelyne/Glory: Godyssey
Publication Date:  September 1996

Alan Moore's Glory #0-2
Publisher:  Avatar Press
Publication Date:  December 2001 - January 2002

Glory #0 was the only issue published by Awesome Comics in March 1999.  After Awesome Comics went bankrupt in 2000, it moved to Avatar Press and was known as Alan Moore's Glory.  Issue #0 was reprinted, but the series ended at issue #2.  Legal reasons are believed to be the reason Glory had to be canceled once more.

*All credit goes to the scanners*
